title.label: Great game but locks up constantly

content.label:
Pros:
Great artwork, story, music, and overall gameplay

Cons: 
Locks up every hour or two, steep learning curve, very challenging (difficult) on all but the very  lowest settings. 

Ultimately I had to delete the game because of the constant freezing and locks ups.
numerous input bugs prevent progression to such an extent the game is unfulfilling and just frustrating.
Don‚Äôt starve together is not on mobile... you should release at least LAN connection on this. It would make it more fun. Other than that the game is great  and really fun.

title.label: Don‚Äôt buy if you have a new iPad

content.label: I have an iPad Air 3.  Open the game and it says this isn‚Äôt compatible and puts me in compatibility mode with lower resolution.  Are you kidding me??  So the game starts fine but UI is small by default.  I try changing it in the setting with the HUD size but nothing happens!  It remains tiny and can‚Äôt even see what I‚Äôm supposed to craft on the screen.  Stay away from this game unless the developer actually decides to update it.

title.label: Love the pc version but no sound on iOS

content.label: I have tried to change the sound settings but I still do not hear any sound. Sound to me brings the game to life and it makes it very hard to play this game.
